cookies.msg: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By using our website you agree to our privacy policy and our terms of service.

contact.subtitle: If you have any questions, please contact us by email or phone.
text: Whether it is a question, comment, critique, inquiry, anything at all.
Do not hesitate to contact us in any case!
We are always happy to hear from you.
We'll do our best to respond within 24 hours.

mail.text: If you have any questions, please contact us by email.

call.text: If you have any questions which cannot be answered by email, or for extremely urgent matters, please call us.

socials.title: Get in touch on social media
socials.text: Follow us on social media to stay up to date with the latest news and developments!

form.accept_terms: I have read and accept the privacy policy and the terms of service.

validation.field_too_short: {item:string} should be at least {min:number} characters long.
validation.field_too_long: {item:string} should be at most {max:number} characters long.
validation.only_alpha: {item:string} should not contain any special characters or numbers.
validation.terms_error: You have to accept the {terms} and the {policy}.
validation.captcha_error: Just to make sure you're not a robot...
validation.fill_out_all: Please fill out all required fields before sending your message.

message.no_items: There are no items yet, check back soon!

blog.intro: Navigate through our Blog and find a post that suits your interests!

cases.intro: We're proud to present a growing selection of cases we have worked on in the past.
